a)    Previous work on FP5 and current H2020 R&D projects. 
 
b)    Work on CEN Standards and EuroNorm Committees
relevant_communication:
Innotrack ( See web page for Publications and dissemination presentations) 
In2Rail   ( Publications and public dissemination due mid 2018)
goals__remit:
a)     To provide systems and support to organizations and projects wishing to demonstrate and ensure delivery of Value  for Money 
 
b)    To improve the economic and technical viability of railway networks throughout Europe through providing expert knowledge and experience gained from working in research, engineering and construction organizations including EC research projects. ERT provide a rare insight gained from much practical and theoretical activities.  
 
c)     Provision of Step Change (30%) Innovation with real benefit in performance, affordability and value.
